definition: the state or an instance of surpassing usual, proper, or specified limits : superfluity
the amount or degree by which one thing or quantity exceeds another
undue or immoderate indulgence : intemperance, an act or instance of intemperance
examples: prevent excesses and abuses by newly created local powers

definition: to an amount or degree beyond : over
more than the usual, proper, or specified amount

examples: excessed several teachers because of budget cutbacks
